Name: RecipeSavvy
Description: RecipeSavvy is a comprehensive web application designed to enhance the culinary experience by providing users with the ability to discover delicious recipes and order fresh fruits and vegetables online. The platform enables users to create accounts, save their favorite recipes, and share their own culinary creations with the community.
Features: Browse a wide variety of recipes with detailed instructions and ingredient lists.
Easily order fresh fruits and vegetables directly from the platform.
Create an account to save favorite recipes and manage orders.
Share your own recipes with the community by adding new recipes to the platform.
Enjoy a seamless experience on both desktop and mobile devices.
Technologies: Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS
API Integration: RESTful APIs for seamless data interaction

Name: API
Description: AnimeQuote API is a feature-rich backend service that allows users to explore a collection of anime quotes, complete with character names, images, and the anime title. The platform supports secure user authentication, enabling users to create accounts, log in, and manage quotes. Admins have the ability to add or delete quotes, ensuring smooth and secure management of the API.
Features: Retrieve random anime quotes along with character names, images, and anime titles.
Secure JWT-based authentication for user login and signup.
Admin-only routes for adding and deleting quotes.
Protected routes for authorized access to anime quotes.
Input validation and error handling for data consistency.
Technologies: Security: JWT (JSON Web Tokens), bcrypt.js for password encryption
Language: TypeScript for type safety and maintainability
